<a name="process-nextick-args"></a>process-nextick-args
=====

[![Buildstatus](https://travis-ci.org/calvinmetcalf/process-nextick-args.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/calvinmetcalf/process-nextick-args)

```bash
npm install --save process-nextick-args
```

Immer in der Lage sein, Argumente an process.nextTick zu übergeben, unabhängig von der Plattform.

```js
var pna = require('process-nextick-args');

pna.nextTick(function (a, b, c) {
  console.log(a, b, c);
}, 'step', 3,  'profit');
```
